action.action-desc: Mr. Connolly (for himself and Mr. McKinley) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To extend the right of appeal to the Merit Systems Protection Board to certain employees of the United States Postal Service.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Postal Employee Appeal Rights Amendments Act.

section.header: Right of appeal to Merit Systems Protection Board
